typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		age as short,
		cars as string[],
		name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 100,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	singleDocument: true,
	wildcardPaths:['Influenza hospitalizations per 100K.csv']) ~> srcdatafile
srcdatafile foldDown(unroll(cars),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Flatten1
srcdatafile select(mapColumn(
		age,
		cars,
		name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 foldDown(unroll(cars),
	mapColumn(
		age,
		cars,
		name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Flatten2
